Desc.entry: Beds available for 44 elderly medical patients. Enjoy in-house entertainment including paid entertainers and have a varied programme for outings eg City Hall, Eden Camp and Care Home Olympics. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ContactName.entry: Mrs J Wright, Manager/John Mitchell, Administrator/Kirsty Wright/Anna Dykes, Activities Co-ordinators

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm (office times), Daily (activities), monthly (meetings for residents and relatives)

category.entry: CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
